page.title: 06POPULATION OF HOLBERROW GN
page.content:
There are 107 dwellings in the area and 229 people on the Electoral Register. Those with children average 2 per family and the estimated population is in the region of 350.
Middle class families moved to the area from other parts of the county to live in the country and yet be in easy reach of facilities. Friends and families tend to live out of the district and therefore these people feel no strong sense of community.
Older inhabitants of the area tend to be the farming families who have lived in the region for many years, sons taking over the family concern and older parents still living close by. There is an indication that the present generation is not inclined towards this trend.
